channel.title: Comments on: Arcade fire responds to Sasha Frere-Jones

item.title: By: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description: Ermm. I think Thomas was being facetious.
item.content:encoded: Ermm. I think Thomas was being facetious.

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: How can you be appalled? Does it seem necessary to you to include every single fucking genre of music into one band? They have a certain sound. and just because it contains some certain aspects of different music, doesn't mean it has to contain them all.
item.content:encoded: How can you be appalled? Does it seem necessary to you to include every single fucking genre of music into one band? They have a certain sound. and just because it contains some certain aspects of different music, doesn’t mean it has to contain them all.

item.title: By: patrick
item.dc:creator: patrick
item.description: Thomas, you <a href="http://www.drawerb.com/2007/11/15/thom-yorke-snubs-sir-paul-mccartneys-duet-invitation/#comment-1089" rel="nofollow">too take music too seriously.</a>
item.content:encoded: Thomas, you too take music too seriously.

item.title: By: Thomas
item.dc:creator: Thomas
item.description: Actually, I was more upset that Arcade Fire's music contains no middle eastern, asian or South American Indian tribal influences, which I find absolutely appalling.
item.content:encoded: Actually, I was more upset that Arcade Fire’s music contains no middle eastern, asian or South American Indian tribal influences, which I find absolutely appalling.

item.title: By: patrick
item.dc:creator: patrick
item.description: the "no cars go" and congotronics comparison is a little bit of a stretch. notwithstanding that, sasha frere-jones is a retard.
item.content:encoded: the “no cars go” and congotronics comparison is a little bit of a stretch. notwithstanding that, sasha frere-jones is a retard.

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: I think SFJ's word-a-day calendar had "miscegenation" in it recently.
item.content:encoded: I think SFJ’s word-a-day calendar had “miscegenation” in it recently.
